title: NFL Draft 2021: Zach Wilson to Jets is no sure thing, insider says
body: BYU quarterback Zach Wilson is expected to land with the New York Jets in the 2021 NFL Draft.Don’t start ordering those uniforms just yet.Just about every mock draft on the planet has the  using the No. 2 pick overall in the  on the BYU quarterback.But  reports he’s talked to one league executive who remains unconvinced Wilson to the Jets is a sure thing.Whether its Wilson or Fields (or Jones or ), bank on the Jets leaving the first round of the draft with a new quarterback after sendingto the Speaking of Lance, the North Dakota State QB is holding his second pro day on Monday. the Broncos, 49ers, Patriots and Falcons are among the teams in attendance.The only QB who isn’t an option for the Jets is Clemson’s  who’s expected to go to theas the No. 1 pick overall.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
